categories: Category:Battles of the Great Jedi Purge

nodes.text:
In 19 BBY, Jedi Master Even Piell battled a group of Imperial stormtroopers in an abandoned building near the Zi-Zhinn Marketplace on the planet Coruscant.
The Jedi Master was mortally wounded by the stormtroopers, but a group of Whiplash dissidents led by Nick Rostu drove away the stormtroopers. Before Evel Piell died, he spoke to Rostu about a mission to find a droid named 10-4TO.
